titles.title: To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to increase transparency and expand coverage options with respect to home and community-based services under a Medicaid waiver.
To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to increase transparency and expand coverage options with respect to home and community-based services under a Medicaid waiver.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.
